com.phunware.mapping

Interface PwOnMapViewStateChangedListener


  • public interface PwOnMapViewStateChangedListener
    Callbacks for when the PwMapView's state changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFloorChange(int oldFloorIndex, int newFloorIndex)
      Called when the floor has changed from an old floor to a new floor.
      void onZoomLevelChange(int oldZoomLevel, int newZoomLevel)
      Called when the zoom level has changed from one to another.

    • Method Detail

      • onFloorChange

        void onFloorChange(int oldFloorIndex,
                 int newFloorIndex)
        Called when the floor has changed from an old floor to a new floor.
        Parameters:
        oldFloorIndex - The index of the old floor.
        newFloorIndex - The index of the floor that is now displaying or loading.

      • onZoomLevelChange

        void onZoomLevelChange(int oldZoomLevel,
                     int newZoomLevel)
        Called when the zoom level has changed from one to another.
        Parameters:
        oldZoomLevel - The level of the old zoom.
        newZoomLevel - The level of the new zoom.
